mods.abstract: ABC DJ program Waitin' For Wakely, originally broadcast 1950-11-28, part 2. Hosted by Cottonseed Clark (filling in for Jimmy Wakely), produced by Jack Wormser, with announcer Reed Browning.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
